ocean.question: I'm big and blue and fish swim through. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I cover most of the Earth.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. I'm very slow, can you understand? What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat green plants.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. I can squirt ink when you come near me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I like to hide in rocks.

ocean.question: I'm a mammal that swims and sings. I'm very big, what am I?

hints.text: 🍼 I drink milk from my mother when young.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and sharp teeth, I swim in the ocean and eat other fish. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 People are sometimes scared of me.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that lives in coral. You might find me if you go snorkeling. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I’m small and swim with my friends

ocean.question: I'm a place in the ocean made of skeletons of tiny animals. Many colorful fish live there. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 It is made of little skeletons.
🧱 It takes a long time to grow.

ocean.question: I’m a type of water movement caused by the moon's pull. I rise and fall each day. What am I?
I'm a very deep and dark part of the ocean. Sunlight doesn't reach me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 It is found very deep in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a giant moving body of water within the ocean. I can affect the weather on land. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I carry warm or cold water.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers and make honey. Who am I?
I'm a colorful insect that starts as a caterpillar. I have beautiful wings and love flowers. What am I?
I march in lines and work together. I carry food that's bigger than me. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I hop and jump, and my legs are long. I love to eat plants and sometimes make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am not an amphibian but share similar jumping abilities.

bug.question: I am a tiny bug that bites and sucks your blood. I can be really annoying in the summer. What am I?
I build my home from silk and hang upside down. Many people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I catch insects in my home.
🏠 My home is called a web.

bug.question: I eat wood and can destroy houses. I live in colonies and build tunnels underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I can cause damage to buildings.
🐜 I am a relative of the ant.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly around at night. I'm often seen in gardens and forests. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 People enjoy catching me in jars.

bug.question: I make a sticky substance that can be used to make fabrics. I eat leaves and spin a cocoon. What am I?

hints.text: 👚 My silk is used for clothing.

bug.question: I am a beetle that can roll a ball of dung. I live in Africa and help to recycle nutrients. What am I?

hints.text: ♻️ I help to break down waste.
